Name: nya-alhajiyusufmuha
Author: Al Haji Yusuf Muhammad Kanyamula
Source: http://goodwordbooks.com/, Goodword Books, Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africa

Translations.Text: Kodi iye sadziwa kuti pamene zonse zili m’manda zidzatulutsidwa ndi kuonetsedwa poyera
Ndizonsezimenezilim’mitimayaanthuzizidzaululidwa
Ndithudi, patsiku limeneli, Ambuye wako adzakhala ali kudziwa chilichonse
Tsiku louka kwa akufa
Kodi tsiku louka kwa akufa ndi chiyani
Kodi ndi chiyani chimene chidzakuuze iwe kuti tsiku louka kwa akufa ndi chiani
Ndi tsiku limene anthu adzakhala ngati dzombe louluka paliponse
Ndi mapiri adzakhala ngati fumbefumbe za ubweya
Ndipo iye amene muyeso wake wa ntchito zabwino udzakhala wolemera
Adzakhala ndi moyo wa chimwemwe ndi chisangalalo
Koma iye amene muyeso wake wa ntchito zabwino udzapezeka wopepuka
Mudzi wake udzakhala dzenje lamoto
Kodi ndi chiyani chimene chidzakuuze zinthu zonsezi
Ndi moto wa malawi osatha
Mpikisano wosonkhanitsa chuma cha padziko wakutangwanikitsani inu
Mpaka pamene inu mulowa m’manda
Iyayi! Inu mudzadziwa
Kachiwiri, Iyayi! Inu mudzadziwa
Iyayi! Inu mukanadziwa kwenikweni
Ndithudi inu mudzaona moto woyaka
Kachiwiri inu mudzauona ndi maso anu
Ndipo patsiku limeneli inu mudzafunsidwa za chisangalalo chimene munali kuchita
Pali nthawi
Ndithudi ! Munthu ndi otayika
Kupatula okhawo amene amakhulupirira ndi kuchita ntchito zabwino ndipo amalimbikitsana wina ndi mzake kuchita chilungamo ndi kukumbutsana kupirira
Tsoka kwa aliyense amene amajeda ndi kuononga mbiri ya anzake
Amene amasonkhanitsa chuma chake ndi kumachiwerenga
Iye amaganiza kuti chuma chake chidzamuchititsa iye kukhala ndi moyo wamuyaya
Iyayi! Ndithudi iye adzaponyedwa ku moto woononga
Kodi chidzakuuza kuti moto woononga ndi chiyani
Ndi moto wa Mulungu umene Mwini wake anauyatsa
Umene umafuka m’mitima ya anthu
Ndithudi udzawatsekereza mbali iliyonse
M’sanamila zoima
Kodi siudaone mmene Mulungu adachitira ndi eni ake a Njovu
Kodi Iye sadasokoneze chiwembu chawo
Ndipo anatumiza gulu la mbalame lolimbana nawo
Zimene zinawalasa miyala ya moto
Ndipo iwo adaoneka ngati msipu wodyedwa
Pofuna kuteteza mtundu wa Quraish
Kuti apitirire pa maulendo nthawi ya Chilimwe ndi m’nthawi ya Chisanu
Motero auzeni kuti azipembedza Ambuye wa Nyumba ino
Amene wawadyetsa m’masiku a njala ndi kuwachotsa mantha
Kodi wamuona munthu amene amakana kuti kuli tsiku la chiweruzo
Iye ndiye amene amazunza mwana wamasiye
Ndipo sakakamiza anthu ena kuti azidyetsa anthu osauka
Motero tsoka kwa iwo amene amapemphera
Amene salabadira mapemphero awo
Amene amachita zabwino pofuna kuti ena awaone
Ndipo amakana kupereka chaulere
Ndithudi takupatsa iwe Mtsinje wa Paradiso
Motero pemphera chifukwa cha Ambuye wako ndipo upereke nsembe
Ndithudi aliyense amene akukwiyitsa iwe adzakhala wopanda choyembekezera
Nena: oh! Inu anthu osakhulupirira
Ine sindipembedza chimene inu mupembedza
Ndiponso inu simudzapembedza chimene ine ndipembedza
Ndipo ine sindidzapembedza chimene inu muli kuchipembedza
Ndipo inu simudzapembedza chimene ine ndimapembedza
Kwa inu chipembedzo chanu ndipo kwa ine chipembedzo changa
Pamene chithandizo cha Mulungu chidza ndi kupambana
Ndipo uona anthu akulowa m’chipembedzo cha Mulungu mu unyinji wawo
Motero lemekeza Ambuye wako ndipo upemphe chikhululukiro chake. Ndithudi Iye amavomera kulapa ndipo ndi wokhululukira
Aonongeke manja a Abu Lahab, ndipo nayenso aonongeke
Chuma chake ndi ana ake sizidzamuthandiza ai
Iye adzalowa m’moto wa lawilawi
Ndipo mkazi wake amene amanyamula nkhuni
Mkhosi mwake muli chingwe chopota cha mlaza
Nena: Iye ndi Mulungu, mmodzi
Mulungu, Mwini Mphamvu zonse
Iye sabereka ndipo Iye sadaberekedwe
Ndipo palibe wina wofanana naye
Nena: “Ine ndifuna kuthawira kwa Ambuye wa M’mbandakucha
Kuchokera ku zinthu zonyansa zimene walenga
Ndi kuchokera ku zonyansa za nthawi ya usiku pamene mdima ufika
Ndi kuchokera ku zonyansa za anthu a matsenga pamene auzila pfundo
“Ndi ku zonyansa za munthu wa dumbo pamene achita nsanje.”
Nena: “Ine ndifuna kuthawira kwa Ambuye wa anthu
Mfumu ya anthu
Mulungu wa anthu
Kuchokera ku zonyansa za kazitape amene amachoka akatha
Amene amanong’oneza m’mitima mwa anthu
Ya majini ndi anthu.”
